timeline.bodyText: I don't think we should throttle this. We don't have enough evidence that it's slowing down the request so I'd keep it as is for now.
timeline.author: jimczi

timeline.bodyText: We use the cancellable  even if the low level cancellation is set to false (query timeout option and bulk scorer) so we should never set the cancellable to null ?
timeline.author: jimczi

replies.bodyText: Yep, sure, I just pushed it to check some other compilation stuff. it's not ready yet, but thx!
replies.author: matriv

timeline.message:
Reduce performance impact of ExitableDirectoryReader

Benchmarking showed that the effect of the ExitableDirectoryReader
is reduced considerably when checking every 4095 docs. Moreover,
set the cancellable task before calling QueryPhase.preProcess()
and make sure we don't wrap with an ExitableDirectoryReader at all
when lowLevelCancellation() is set to false to avoid completely any
performance impact.

Follows: #52822
Follows: #53166
Follows: #53496
